description:
Hozuki deals with an irate old hag and a giant sick crab. Later, the European King of Hell visits, and Hozuki gives him the grand tour.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Demons and Underwear and Crabs / The State of Hell, and This and That
Démons, caleçons et crabes / Remue-ménage dans les Enfers
Oni to Pants to Kani / Jigoku no Sata to Are ya Kore
鬼とパンツとカニ / 地獄の沙汰とあれやこれ
